1413.content:
After taking the next fifteen minutes meandering through the city, Julie was beginning to get pretty bored. Normally the sheer power involved with having an entire miniature city at her feet kept her pretty content, but there was something missing. Hmm, maybe it would show up when Amanda did, since she should be here in a few minutes. For now, Julie decides to sit down, inadverdantly but unreprehensibly crushing a car under her butt. It folded inward from the pressure, and since it was running the fuel ignited and burned itself to a charred hulk.

The giantess above barely felt the tiny lick of flame, which was the equivalent of having a spark from the stove hit her. It had been a nice touch shrinking actual cars to use in the model, although her neighbors weren't so thrilled when their car was, er, stolen a few months ago. Just as Julie was thinking these things, she heard the familiar sound of a knock on her door. Rushing over to the exit, she nearly toppled all of the buildings nearby. More screams, but she had long since learned to dismiss them as crickets chirping. After quickly slipping through the door and closing it swiftly behind her, Amanda walked in.

"Hey, Manda. What's up?"
"Nothing really, was hoping you had something in mind," her friend answered, a smile plastered on her beautiful face.
"Well, actually... hmm, follow me, alright?" Her friend nodded, taking her lead.
It was time she showed her friend what she'd been keeping a secret from all but a handful of her closest friends. Pushing open the door, Julie revealed her mini metropolis, with Amanda gasping and pushing a lock of brown hair from her face to make sure she was seeing clearly.

"It's all real, Amanda. It took a lot of work tomake this happen,"Julie beamed.
"I... this is impossible. And all the little people--"
"Real,every last pathetic insect among them. They answer to only us."

But As I trapped her loved son under my big toe she started to move. "Faster!", I demanded Impatiently.

As the women was finaly standing next to the still living piece of meat which was her beloved man a few minutes she had to turn around and vomit. "Ohhh, that is disguesting. Is that a way to live "In good and in bad" I don't think so. And since you have to puke if you see him, I want you to kill him. Crush him. Step up on him. Then you and your son will live and have the bread. If you not act in 10 seconds, I will crack every single bone in the body of your son with my fingernail. Then I'll rip him up limb for limb before I crush every piece between my fingers and flick the remains onto you. I will end with the head. Then I will put his torso onto the other half squashed bug and smash the remains so badly you can't tell them appart. And you, my little bitch, will have the honor to clean my foot of off their gory remains. Be sure that I am going to let you live if you don't kill that guy. You will live and you will remember this incident until the rest of your life as my little pet. And I will take very good care off you.

The women lifted her foot... Unsure what to do... Live as a pet. Perhaps much longer than in this city, or save her son for at least a while.

"Don't even think of letting that hand go!", I hissed to the tiny man under my toe.
1442221.title: Let the wife finish him off

choices: You head back into the center of the city,
The shrinkees have started a protest at Julie's feet.
She finds a man still barely alive on her big toe.
145.content:
"Sorry guys, but I'm working up a tad bit of hunger. I just might have to finish off all of this bread!"
There came a flurry of wails, screams, and curses that pricked at Julie's ears like a cricket's incessant chirping. She was getting to be a bit annoyed with these complainers. Just then she got an idea. An evil, despicable, awful idea. (Grinch reference) She'd let her subjects have their bread.
"OK, guys, I've had a change of heart." Julie placed the loaves of bread on the floot and backed away. "You can have the bread. Come and get it."
Some seemed cautious, but their hunger overwhelemed their judgment. Most ran towards the loves, starting to dig in immeditely. That's when Julie's plan started to work. After enough people had huddled on the two loaves of bread, she picked them up, bread and all. More screams and protests.

This would be Julie's favorite part of all. The giantess put both bread pieces on the tower, so they wouldn't be able to get off, and then went out the door. The confused shrinkees waited atop the tower, eating the bread like ants. Just then, Julie's thundering footfalls were heard again, and she slinked over to the tower with cheese, lettuce, tomatoes and other things. She dropped the ingredients onto the people who were on the bread. She then lifted the sandwhich to her moutch and chewed. She never knew humans would have such flavor. Some people jumped off of their sandwhich, collapsing on the floor or on Julie's feet. One unlucky man dropped into Julie's cleavage, instantly trapped. After she'd finished the sandwhich, Julie picked up the "crumb" that'd landed in her bra. She pulled him out with two fingers, holding him up to her face.

"Did you like it in their, little guy? I bet you did. Well, I'm not letting you off that easily. After all, you skipped dinner without asking to be excused!"
The titaness laughed a bit at her corny joke and then, without further adieu, popped the one inch man into her mouth. I'll never get bored of that taste, Julie mused.
145.title: Julia keeps the food

choices: Grabs a cardboard bus with people in it
15.content:
A deafening sound of a door closing was heard, followed by enourmous footsteps that grew stronger and louder by each step. The confused little people panicked and began to run around, not knowing what is going on. One moment they were going about their regular lives, until just blacking out. Few vaguely recall seeing a strange looking girl before they to passed out. Now they are in this realistic model city with no clue where exactly they are at!

Just then, a huge shadow casted over the city. The tiny people looked up and spotted a huge Japanese girl with her hands resting on her waist, looking down at them all. She puts on a very evil and mean look on her face! Her name is Naoko. She had spent four months capturing all these little people, and another two months crafting together this miniature looking city. Naoko was wearing a white tank-top, blue shorts and black flip-flops. The people were so small that Naoko's big toe would be taller than them! Naoko then takes her first step into the small city, placing her foot down in the middle of the paper road. Dozens scream in terror as the giantess prepares to start her favorite part.....Rampage!! What does Naoko do first?
15.title: Naoko's little city

152.content:
Naoko then reaches down torwards a group of people below! They scream in terror and split up running as her mighty hand swoops over and scoops up her first victims, a little man and woman! She brings them up to her face and smiles for a couple of seconds before tipping her head back slightly and depositing them into her mouth. She then begins to chew for five seconds, sucking on their flavor before swallowing.

"Mmmm....." She moans softly...


Spotting another group nearby, Naoko then reaches down again, grabbing about six little people in a handfull this time! She brings their screaming bodies up to her face and she proceeds to,
152.title: Yum

info.brief_description: An alternative version to my story "Shrunk in a toy city"
info.description:
This is an alternative version for another story of mine: "Shrunk in a toy city". You can find its description in the link below (IT'S IMPORTANT TO READ IT!):

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1532755

The version in the link is told from a victim's POV, but this version is told from the girls POV.
The concept is the same: five beautiful girls like rampaging a toy city full of shrunk people like they were giantesses. The five girls are the same too, you can find their description in the link.
The owner of the flat with the toy city in is the girl named Lilian.
You don't need to follow the plot of the first version, you don't need to make the GTS meet the protagonist of the story in the link, you can do what you want if you follow the rules: no gay scenes and shit-related scenes.

Have fun!
